Key Match Events: Kyle Farmer hit a three-run home run in the second inning
Matt Wallner hit a solo shot in the third and a two-run double in the sixth
Carlos Santana hit a two-run home run
Pablo LÃ³pez pitched seven innings without an earned run, striking out 10
Griffin Canning surrendered a career-high 10 runs
Post-Match Reflections: The Twins' victory ended a four-game losing streak
The Twins have a three-game edge in the race for the last of three AL wild-card spots
Zach Neto hit a three-run homer in the fifth inning
Trevor Larnach reached base all four times he batted
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kyle Farmer's homer prompted a reappearance of the Twins' lucky summer sausage mascot
Angels' Anthony Rendon went to the injured list with an oblique strain
Angels' Ben Joyce was placed on the IL with shoulder inflammation
Twins' Byron Buxton, Carlos Correa, Max Kepler, and Manny Margot took live batting practice before the game
Angels' rookie RHP Jack Kochanowicz will pitch on Wednesday night
Twins' RHP Zebby Matthews will pitch the final game of the series
